attributes.action: Terrorists charged with Treason and given the death penalty
attributes.additional_details: After todays events of a young soldier being killed on the streets of woolwich. I personally feel it's about time all our Associations from all wings of the ARMY/Navy/Airforce Organise a march on 10 downing street To show we have had Enough of our serving soldiers being killed in there Home country and the Murders getting a pathetic jail sentence instead of being Tried for treason for taking up arms against a member of her majesty's forces and not receiving the DEATH penalty. How many more must suffer due to our limp wristed weak politicians not doing there job in protecting our Lands. To hand in this petition demanding a change in law.
